BodyName: Committee on Civil Service and Labor

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to civil service examination fee waivers for high school students and first time applicants
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Civil service examination fee waivers for high school students and first time applicants.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to pass, and the New York State Governor to sign, S. 28A /A. 1006, which would eliminate the subminimum wage for employees based on their disability or age.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Eliminate the subminimum wage for employees based on their disability or age (S.28A /A.1006)
